ourStoryText: Founded to close the gap between ambition and execution, Bonn Factory was built on a simple belief: Saudi brands deserve manufacturing partners who are as dedicated to quality and speed as they are to vision. From our first production line to today’s integrated facility, we’ve kept our promise—combining advanced processes, disciplined QA/Regulatory practices, and a partnership-first mindset. We work side-by-side with founders, pharmacies, and retailers—translating briefs into stable formulas, compliant packs, and scalable production. Our team blends engineering precision with market insight, turning concepts into shelf-ready products that consumers trust and remember.

rnd.title: Research & Development
rnd.subtitle: From Concept to Compliant, Stable, and Scalable Formulations
rnd.intro: At Bonn, our R&D team is the engine driving innovation and quality in every product we create. With deep expertise in cosmetic science, regulatory compliance, and market trends

process.title: R&D Process — Step by Step

steps.title: Idea Research & Market Benchmarking
steps.desc: Analyzing trends, feedback, and reference products to identify opportunities for improvement and innovation.

steps.title: Data Preparation & Specifications
steps.desc: Defining requirements and customer specifications to ensure formulation relevance.

steps.title: Initial Formulation
steps.desc: Designing preliminary formulations using the latest ingredient science and safety guidelines.

steps.title: R&D Trials & Analytical Testing
steps.desc: Lab trials paired with chemical and microbiological analyses for safety, efficacy, and stability.

steps.title: Product Evaluation
steps.desc: Assessing lab performance, safety testing, and real-world trials when needed.

steps.title: Stability Formulation & Testing
steps.desc: Advanced stability studies meeting local (SFDA) and global standards for reliable shelf life.

steps.title: Design & Packaging Development
steps.desc: Attractive, functional, and compliant packaging that protects the product and stands out on shelves.

steps.title: Product Registration
steps.desc: End-to-end registration management aligned with Saudi and international regulations for smooth market entry.

steps.title: Delivery & Logistics
steps.desc: Flexible supply and shipping solutions ensuring on-time delivery.

steps.title: Feedback & Continuous Improvement
steps.desc: Leveraging post-delivery insights to refine R&D, production, and documentation continuously.

process.feedbackDesc: We gather post-delivery feedback and turn it into actionable improvements in formulations, processes, and documentation—connecting lab to production line and market.

departments.title: Microbiology Lab
departments.desc: Certified microbial testing to ensure safety, immunity, and product quality.

departments.title: Quality Control — Chemical Analysis
departments.desc: Rigorous analytical verification and contamination control to ensure batch-to-batch consistency.
